anuradhapura wathsala thissamaharamaye holman kala hati (awasan kotasa) in dina kihipayakata pasuwa supurudu ayurin wathsala ha kathabaha kala nimal hamuwimata sthanayakda yojana kaleya kisiwak nodath aya wenada menma nimal kerehi wishwasayen eyata kamaththa pala kaleya ee dinaya udawiya thama mithurage thri wilarayen gamana yama sandaha pitath wiya.(giya sthanaya danaganimata nohaki wiya) ese yami sthanayakata gos dedenama thaniwi pem bas mumunannata wiya eheth tika welawakin nimalge saba swarupaya mathuwannata wiya nimalge athin wathsalage jiwithaya ee mohothe winashawi giyeya...ethanin nonawathuna nimal thama mithuratada awasthawa laba dunne mara weshayeni hith pith nathi mithura thama ashawada risise itu karagaththe wathsalage wilapaya madaya..kese namuth nimalta athi wu anukampawa nisa aya nomara nawathath wirawila handiya asalata genawith dama mithurada kaduwa wegayen thissa bala dhawanaya kaleya..dadi lesa asaranawa siti wathsalata daragatha nohaki siduwima hamuwe thama jiwithaya pawa epa wuyeya aya me papathara lokaya hara yannata hitha gaththe shanikawaya aathin wegayen aa basrathaya panne nimal saha ohuge mithuragen paliganna bawa sithamin wiya yuthuya..wathsalage sellakkara jiwithaya ethanin nima wuni....wathsalage awasan katayuthu itu kirimen dina kihipayakata pasuwa&
